articles.description: The increasing use of intravenous drugs by addicts in Himachal makes them vulnerable to AIDS. It has become a cause for concern though the AIDS prevalence rate in Himachal is relatively low as compared to the national rate.
articles.content:
Tribune News Service
Shimla, December 1
